data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fukushima, Caroline Sayuri, Bertani, Rogério, Jr, Pedro Ismael Da Silva (2005): Revision of Cyriocosmus Simon, 1903, with notes on the genus Hapalopus Ausserer, 1875 (Araneae: Theraphosidae). Zootaxa 846: 1-31, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170714
